info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:52PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Montgomery County through 430 PM CDT... At 352 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mimosa, or 7 miles west of Mount Ida. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oden... Mimosa... Pencil Bluff... Pine Ridge... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
